attributes.action: Add Third Party Insurance to Car Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With rising numbers of people driving uninsured due to excessive premiums would it not be easier to add £100 to car tax and insure all taxed vehicles.
You then have the choice to pay for Fire, theft or fully comprehensive.
This system works in other countries.
Many people due to age, location and many other reasons are not getting insurance.
